profile: The user displays a strong interest in music-related documentaries, particularly focusing on artists from the underground hip-hop and horrorcore scenes. They favor behind-the-scenes content that provides exclusive looks into the lives and tours of their favorite performers. The high rating and enthusiastic review suggest a deep appreciation for detailed storytelling and authenticity in music narratives. The user likely values engaging visuals and well-produced content, as evidenced by their positive feedback.
